resources.string: You had a total of %s employees.

string-array.name: instruction_texts
string-array.item: Each turn you can perform one action - buy, produce, sell or hire.
The game is over when your money is below 0.
You earn money by selling products.
You loose money by buying, salary and hiring.
You need 1 raw material to produce 1 product.
You have to pay money when hiring a new employee, depending on their type.
You pay every employee $1 each turn.
Each purchaser buys 1 raw material each turn.
Each producer produces 1 product each turn.
Each salesperson sells 1 product each turn.
Each manager hires a new employee each turn.
The type of the new employee depends on the type of the manager.
Managers can hire other types of managers.
Have as many employees as possible after %d turns.
